entries.title_d: With the increased Imperial threat in the Yavin system, the Alliance is helping refugees escape the system. You need to make sure they make it through the Imperial blockade safely. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at anytime.
entries.title: Yavin system: Duty mission: Protect refugee freighters.
entries.thanks_5: All refugees safe and sound. Thanks for your help, pilot!
entries.thanks_4: I can't believe we made it! Thanks a million, pal!
entries.thanks_3: Very impressive, my friend! The Force is with you...
entries.thanks_2: Whew, thanks for thinking fast there. We would have been spaced without your help!
entries.thanks_1: Thanks for taking out those punks. Now let's get these refugees back home!
entries.taunt_4: I've got you in my sights.
entries.taunt_2: Refugees, eh? You expect us to believe that... traitor?!
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are out. Get rid of those fighters now!
entries.reason_5: This is the freight commander speaking. Form up and keep us safe! We have a lot of injured on-board and don't need any more excitement!
entries.reason_4: Good to see you, pilot! Cover us so we can get these refugees back where they belong.
entries.reason_3: Hey there, pilot! Let's get these refugees back home. Whadda you say?
entries.reason_2: Requesting fighter escort. Repeat! Requesting fighter escort!
entries.reason_1: Alliance Freighter reporting! We have a hold full of refugees who need to get home, buddy.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: You should now have the coordinates of another refugee freighter in need of an escort. Hurry over there and protect them at all costs.
entries.quest_location_d: Since the destruction of the Imperial enormous space station the Yavin system is overrun with Imperial forces trying to salvage what's left of it and making sure no one else steal anything. They have put a blockade up over the moon of Yavin 4 so escorting the refugee freighters will prove tricky.
entries.quest_escort_d: This will prove to be quite tough, the Empire's block on the Yavin 4 moon will make sneaking out without being noticed near to impossible.
entries.panic_5: Those new contacts don't look friendly. The Force be with us, friend.
entries.panic_4: No, no, no. Not now. This was my last job of the day. Why can't they just leave us alone!
entries.panic_3: Those new ships are moving in too fast for it to be a coincidence. Prepare for assault.
entries.panic_2: I think...no it can't be... They're opening fire! Hostiles! Repeat, hostiles on attack vector!
entries.panic_1: They're moving to attack! Please help us!
entries.hull_half: I'm tracking multiple hull breaches! I can't take much more damage. Help!
entries.goodbye_5: We're ready to get these refugees back home. Thanks for the escort!
entries.goodbye_4: What a ride! The Alliance owes me more than standard pay, I think! Thanks for the escort, though.
entries.goodbye_3: Yeah! We made it. The Alliance owes you a debt of gratitude. Thanks!
entries.goodbye_2: Alright, I can take it from here. Time to get these people home... Thanks!
entries.goodbye_1: Everyone on-board appreciates your help! Thank you!
entries.found_loc: Travel to the rally point and wait for the refugee transport to arrive.
entries.failed_protect: The Alliance refugee transport has been redirected. Your mission is a failure.
entries.failed_destroy: Those refugees were depending on you, Pilot! Return to your commanding officer at once!
entries.complete: The refugees have made it through the region safely. Good job.
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < Sensors indicate no more fighter vessels with armed weapon systems in area. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Vessels on intercept course approaching, weapon systems armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: Wait at this location. An Alliance refugee transport will arrive shortly.
entries.abort: Abort code received. Heading back to base.
